name: Dangerous Dungeon (Brett Chalupa)
description:
Can you survive the Dangerous Dungeon?

A simple dungeon crawler prototype.

Explore three floors of a randomly generated dungeon. Fight ogres. Eat hearts. Find your lost key!

Works with keyboard, gamepads, and swipes. When swiping, you can hold your swipe to keep moving in that direction until you release.

Heyo! Dangerous Dungeon is a prototype. It's not representative of a finished game. There's no music, and it's not polished. It's just my first attempt at making a game with procedural generation.

If you think Dangerous Dungeon is a neat idea, let me know! I'm interested in expanding it to be a full game for phones and desktop computers.

Character sprites by Atelier Pixerelia.
